name: stellar-suite
description: Improves the developer experience when building smart contracts on Stellar. Build, deploy, and manage contracts directly from VS Code.

commands.title: Stellar Suite: Restore State from Backup
Stellar Suite: Replay Simulation with Modifications
Stellar Suite: Compare Last N Simulations
Stellar Suite: Compare With Previous Simulation
Stellar Suite: Compare Latest With Any

stellarSuite.rpcUrl.description: Stellar RPC endpoint URL for transaction simulation

stellarSuite.rpcEndpoints.description: List of Stellar RPC endpoints for fallback and health monitoring.

stellarSuite.automaticFailover.description: Automatically failover to the next healthy RPC endpoint if the current one fails.

stellarSuite.useLocalCli.description: Use local Stellar CLI instead of RPC endpoint

stellarSuite.cliPath.description: Path to Stellar CLI executable. Use full path if not in PATH (e.g., '/Users/username/.cargo/bin/stellar' or 'stellar' if in PATH)

stellarSuite.source.description: Source identity to use for contract invocations (e.g., 'dev')

stellarSuite.network.description: Network to use for deployments and invocations (testnet, mainnet, etc.)

stellarSuite.rpc.rateLimit.maxRetries.description: Maximum number of times to retry an RPC request after hitting a rate limit.

stellarSuite.rpc.rateLimit.initialBackof.description: Initial backoff time (in milliseconds) before the first retry.

stellarSuite.rpc.rateLimit.maxBackoffMs.description: Maximum backoff time (in milliseconds) when rate-limited.

stellarSuite.keyboard.showHints.description: Show keyboard shortcut hints on contract cards in the sidebar.

stellarSuite.signing.defaultMethod.description: Default signing method for deployment transactions.

stellarSuite.signing.requireValidatedSig.description: Require successful signature validation before deployment is submitted.

stellarSuite.signing.enableSecureKeyStor.description: Allow storing deployment keypairs in VS Code SecretStorage.

stellarSuite.deployment.retry.maxAttempt.description: Maximum number of deployment attempts (initial attempt + retries).

stellarSuite.deployment.retry.initialDel.description: Initial backoff delay in milliseconds before the first retry.

stellarSuite.deployment.retry.maxDelayMs.description: Maximum backoff delay in milliseconds between retry attempts.

stellarSuite.deployment.retry.backoffMul.description: Exponential backoff multiplier applied after each failed attempt.

stellarSuite.deployment.retry.useJitter.description: Add random jitter to retry delays to prevent thundering-herd retries.

stellarSuite.deployment.retry.attemptTim.description: Per-attempt timeout in milliseconds. Timed-out attempts are retried if attempts remain.
